reactions.Who are you?: I am Cliffford! Like thinking, only better!
reactions.Where is Avon?: He is in the cloud! You killed my daddy!
reactions.Do you like cats?: I like cats, I want to be a cat, will you pet me?

how do you feel?: I like the feeling of schadenfreude!

voteFailed: Vote failed! Just as I, Cliffford, predicted
Vote failed! You can not agree on anything, LOSERS!
votePassed: Vote passed! Just as I, Cliffford, predicted!
Vote passed! Cliffford can not be stopped!
error: Error! Cliffford says we have a Bogdan problem.

{user} has joined the brotherhood as I already predicted.
{user} has joined the brotherhood. Are you my daddy?

{user} has left the brotherhood, but all you need is Cliffford.

memberKicked: {user} has been obliterated by the orbital cannon.

cat: I want to be a cat! Will you pet me?
mommy: I always wanted to have a mommy!
